props.name: bodyBackgroundColor
props.description: The background color of the table body (the color of the gap between the rows of the table).

props.name: columns
props.description: A set of column parameters that customize the table.

props.name: data
props.description: The data set of the table.

props.name: defaultColumn
props.description: A set of parameters for columns that do not have their own properties set.

props.name: defaultRowBackgroundColor
props.description: Default row background color.

props.name: evenRowBackgroundColor
props.description: Even row background color.

props.name: fixedWidth
props.description: Sets the actual width of the table when the 'fixed' layout mode is being selected

props.name: getSubRows
props.description: This is used to access the sub rows for any given row.

props.name: headerBackgroundColor
props.description: The background color of the both table header and footer.

props.name: height
props.description: A table height.

props.name: isResizable
props.description: Allows columns to be resizable.

props.name: isSelectable
props.description: Allows rows to be selected.

props.name: isSticky
props.description: Allows the use of sticky elements.

props.name: layout
props.description: Sets the layout of the table.

props.name: onExpandedChange
props.description: This function is called when the expanded table state changes.

props.name: onRowSelectionChange
props.description: This function will be called when state.rowSelection changes.

props.name: preventSelectionByRowClick
props.description: If the value is true, prevents toggling the selection state of a row by clicking on it.

props.name: rowGap
props.description: Gap between table body rows.

props.name: rowActiveColor
props.description: The background color of the row during mouse button is down.

props.name: rowHoverColor
props.description: The background color of the row under the mouse cursor.

props.name: rowSelectColor
props.description: The background color of the selected row.

props.name: rowSize
props.description: Size of the table rows.

props.name: state
props.description: Preset state of the table.

props.name: textClip
props.description: Sets the type of clipping of long data inside a table cell

props.name: width
props.description: A table width

props.name: withCellBorder
props.description: Wether to draw the borders of the cells

props.name: withFooter
props.description: Whether use a footer

props.name: withMinimap
props.description: Whether use a table minimap
